rob.name: robbery notifications
rob.description: get a dm when someone attempts to rob you

lottery.name: lottery notifications
lottery.description: get a dm when you win the lottery

premium.name: premium notifications
premium.description: get dm notifications for updates on your premium membership

auction.name: auction notifications
auction.description: get a dm when someone buys your auctions

vote.name: vote notificatons
vote.description: get a dm when you vote to show your rewards for voting

voteReminder.name: vote reminders
voteReminder.description:
receive a reminder in your dms when you are able to vote again

+**2**% multiplier

worker.name: worker notifications
worker.description: get a dm when one of your workers has reached full capacity

types.name: only when full
types.description: only receive a notification when all of your workers are full

types.name: all
types.description: receive a notification when any amount of workers are full

booster.name: booster notifications
booster.description: get a dm when one or more of your boosters have expired

payment.name: payment notifications
payment.description: get a dm when someone sends you money or gives you an item

netWorth.name: net worth updates
netWorth.description: get a dm when your net worth changes by the amount set. currently: ${VALUE}

other.name: miscellaneous
other.description: get a dm for miscellaneous things, such as guild level upgrades

auctionConfirm.name: auction confirmation
auctionConfirm.description: require auction confirmation on items more expensive than: ${VALUE} (0 = never)
